text: If Security Groups work like a firewall; what is the purpose of using Network ACLs (NACLs)?

answers.text: NACLs are needed to secure containers in Elastic Container Service. Security Groups are needed for EC2 instances.
NACLs work as a firewall for Subnets. Security Groups are a firewall for EC2 instances.
NACLs are needed to specifically protect RDS.
NACLs work as a firewall for EC2 instances. Security Groups are a firewall for Subnets.
